short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide comments and suggestions on YouTube, in order to stay focused on the content that you originally came for.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is just a CSS stylesheet for youtube.com that blocks all comments and 
suggested content. You can still browse users and channels, subscribe, and 
watch; but you're more or less in control of what you see. This is helpful for limiting the extent to which children (and grownups) diverge from their original focus.
